1.content:
It was a baking hot summer in Town.

The 6 Babies (Tommy, Dil, Chuckie, Phil, Lil,and Kimi) were playing catch the Beach ball in their playpen.

Stu Was Reading the Newspaper and Didi and the other parents were trying to figure out where were they going to put the kids for the summer, Since all of them were needed to help Charlotte and Drew with a huge amount of work in the office.

Stu was still reading the papers to think and help them find a solution.

Stu turned the page to find something.

Hey, Everyone!

There is something on the paper and it says...
1.title: Chapter 1

11.content:
"Mother in training program." Stu read. He read a bit more into it.
Didi grinned on hearing about it.
"Susie would like that, she's great with the kids. It'd be good for Angelica too."
They contact who about it first?
11.title: Preschool's Mother in training Program

111.content:
"Hey, Lucy," said Stu on the phone, "I read in the news that Susie's preschool has a new 'mother-in-training' program for the girls. Don't ask me why the boys don't have something equivalent, but I was wondering if you could sign Susie up for it?"
"Sure thing," said Lucy, "and I'll talk to the teachers about why it's only for girls. Surely boys can be fathers in training too."

He then phoned Drew and Charlotte, who jumped at the chance, because while they didn't know if Angelica would ever have kids, they wanted her to be the best mom ever if she did.

On the first day of the program, Angelica said to Susie, "I'll bet I'll be a better mommy than you when we have kids!"
"We'll see about that," said Susie.

Their first lesson was in...
111.title: Lucy.

1112.content: Who do we follow with this lesson first?
1112.title: Feeding babies.

11121.content:
"Okay girls," said the woman in charge, "I'm Olivia and I'm going to teach you how to look after babies for if you decide to be a mom one day."

"Now," she said, "here is a baby doll. Susie, you're up first. Your first lesson is in feeding a baby. Now, obviously, you're a little young to learn about nursing, so I will teach you about..."
11121.title: Susie.

111211.content:
Susie smiled.
"No problem. I've worked with some real babies before."
"Good."
Did she manage it with no issues?
111211.title: Bottle feeding.

1112111.content:
Seeing as she'd fed Dil, bottle-feeding a stationary doll was easy peasy lemon squeezy.
Next up, it was Angelica's turn.
Does she find it easy as Susie?
1112111.title: Yeah

11121112.content: What went wrong for her?
11121112.title: No.

111211121.content:
Angelica found it hard to feed her baby doll and she kept missing the doll's mouth, but she eventually got it right.
The next lesson was on...
111211121.title: She missed the doll's mouth.

choices: The nipple falls off the bottle.
111211122.content: Why does Angelica have trouble with her baby doll?
111211122.title: SE

1112112.content: Why would she have trouble? Surely real babies would be harder than a dummy one?
1112112.title: Had some trouble.

11122.content: "Okay, Angelica," said the woman, "I'm Olivia and I'm here to teach you how to be a mom. Today, I will teach you to feed a baby with a...
11122.title: Angelica.

choices: Spoon and a jar of food.
11123.content:
"Okay, girls," said a young woman, "My name is Olivia and I'm here to show you how to feed a baby."

She handed Angelica, Susie, and the six other young girls in their class a baby doll each.

"Now, to practice, I will give you each a...
11123.title: Both at the same time.

112.content:
"Hey, Charlotte," said Didi on the phone, "I heard that Angelica's preschool has a new 'mother in training' program and I was wondering if you'd like to sign Angelica up."
"Sure," said Charlotte, "If Angelica has kids in the future, they'll need to be raised from the best!"

She then contacted Lucy and Randall, who agreed to sign Susie up for the program too.

The girls' first lesson was in...
112.title: Charlotte.

1121.content: Dressing a baby was their first lesson, but, who do we follow with it?
1121.title: Dressing babies.

11211.content:
"Hello, class," said the woman in charge, "I'm Olivia and I'm here to teach you young ladies how to look after a baby unless you want to be a mom some day. Your first lesson is in dressing a baby, Angelica, you're up first."

Angelica walked up and was handed a naked baby doll.

"Now, first, we have to put its diaper on. Lay the diaper out, put the baby on top of it with its belly up, then do up the straps."

Angelica followed the instructions and soon the baby doll was wearing a little diaper.
She then had to dress the baby doll in...
11211.title: Angelica.

112111.content: She'd never done it before, but, did she manage it with no trouble?
112111.title: A onesie.

1121111.content:
Angelica put a green onesie on the baby doll and buttoned it up.
Next up was Susie, who dressed her baby in a diaper and...
1121111.title: Yeah

choices: She puts it on upside down.
She can't fit the arms and legs through.
She has trouble with the buttons.
1121112.content: What trouble does Angelica have with the onesie?
1121112.title: Nah.

11212.content:
"OK, class," said Olivia, the woman in charge of the class, "Your first lesson is on dressing babies. Susie, you're up first."

Susie walked up to the front and was handed a baby doll.

"Now then," said Olivia, "First you need to place the baby on its back, lay a diaper under it, and then fasten the straps of the diaper."

Susie did that.
She was then asked to dress the baby in...
11212.title: Susie.

112121.content: She managed to do so on the second try. "Great. Your next lesson, feeding a baby via a..."
112121.title: A dress.

1121211.content:
Meanwhile, Angelica had dressed her baby doll in a shirt and pants.
Their next lesson was on spoon-feeding babies.
They put their baby dolls in little high chairs and had to spoon-feed them play dough.
What happens now?
1121211.title: Spoon.

1121212.content:
The girls compared their baby dolls: Susie's was in a little white dress, while Angelica's was in a pink onesie.
Their next lesson was on bottle feeding babies.
What happens?
1121212.title: Bottle

11213.content:
"Good afternoon, girls," said the teacher, "I'm going to prepare you for if you decide to be moms when you grow up."
She then handed Angelica, Susie, and the other girls at the school, a baby doll.

"Now," said Olivia, "You're going to be learning how to dress up a baby. The first thing you need to put on is, as you probably know, its diaper. To do that, lie the baby on its back, slide the diaper under it, then do up the straps."

Once the girls did that, they were handed some more clothes to put on the baby dolls.
Were they all handed matching outfits?
11213.title: Both of them.

12.content:
"It's a new summer camp for children under five," said Stu.
"The kids would love that," said Didi, and she went inside to where Chas, Kira, Betty, and Howard were chatting.
"So Stu read about a summer camp for children under five and I was planning on sending the boys to it this Saturday. Are you interested?"
"Sure!" said Betty, "The pups are very adventurous!".
"I dunno," said Chas, "What if they get sick or hurt?"
"They'll be fine," said Kira, "The place is designed specifically for young ones."
"It's a deal," said Betty.

Are Susie and Angelica coming too?
12.title: A new baby Summer camp

121.content: Lucy and Charlotte were also told about it, and agreed that Susie and Angelica could come along to it. Who later told the babies about it?
121.title: Yes.

choices: The kids talk about summer camp together.
Skip to them arriving at camp.
1211.content:
"Guess what, kids?" said Didi, the next time all eight kids were together in the same room.
"What?" said Angelica.
"All eight of you are going to summer camp together!".

Tommy, Kimi, Susie, and the twins said, "Yay!", while Chuckie looked a bit unsure and Dil kept sucking on his pacifier.
"I don't want to go to camp with Susie and those dumb babies!" said Angelica.
"Now now," said Didi, "You're all signed up, so you'll have to go."
"Oh, all right," said Angelica, "but there had better be cookies there."

What happens now?
1211.title: Didi.

12112.content: Soon, all 8 arrived, being dropped off by their mothers. Who do we follow first on getting there?
12112.title: Skip to them arriving at camp.

choices: They get introduced to other campers.
121121.content:
Susie was the first to speak: "Wow!" she said, "This is the first time I've been to a summer camp."

Next to speak was Phil, who said, "I wish there are worms to eat."
Lil didn't say anything, but she licked her lips.

Chuckie said, "I hope there are no lions or bears around here."

"Well, I wouldn't mind lions and bears," said Kimi, "I likes aminals!".

"Don't worry, Chuckie," said Tommy, "Our mommies and daddies would never send us to a dangerous place."

"I don't care," said Angelica, "Where are the cookies?".

Dil, of course, didn't speak, being only three months old.

What happens now?
121121.title: Susie

1211212.content: All were soon introduced to other campers. Some younger, some older. They were first introduced to the...
1211212.title: They get introduced to other campers.

12112121.content: The younger ones were ages zero to...
12112121.title: Younger ones

12112122.content: The older campers were ages...
12112122.title: Older.

choices: They get introduced to other campers.
121122.content:
Angelica was the first to speak: "I don't want to be at this dumb place! I'd rather be at home watching Cynthia P.I."

"It'll be fun!" said Susie.

"Yeah," said Kimi, "We might even see some snakes!"

"See some snakes?!" said Chuckie, "That sounds scary!"

"It can't be that bad, Chuckie!" said Tommy, "It'll be an adventure."

Chuckie still looked unsure.

"If I see a worm, I'll promise you I'll share it," said Lil.
Phil licked his lips.
Dil, of course, didn't speak.

What happens now?
121122.title: Angelica

1211221.content: Were the boys and girls in different dorms?
1211221.title: They get shown their dormitories.

choices: Andrea and Henry show the rest of the camp.
The girls talk to the other girls at the camp & the boys talk 2 the other boys.
12112211.content:
"Welcome, class, to the Sunshine Fields camp for kids under five. I'm Andrea, the person in charge, and the first thing I'm going to do is show you your dormitories. You girls come with me and the boys follow my associate Frank."

So Lil, Kimi, Susie, and Angelica walked off with Andrea, while Tommy, Chuckie, Phil, and Dil went off with Henry.

"Why do I sleeps in a different room from Philip?" said Lil.
"Lots of places separate the boys and the girls' rooms," said Susie, "I think it's so the boys don't see the girls getting dressed."
"But Mommy and Daddy dress me in front of Philip," said Lil.
Susie just shrugged.

Meanwhile, Phil was also grumpy about sleeping apart from Lil, but Tommy said, "It's only for going night-night, though. I'm sure we'll get to see the girls during the day."
"That's easy for you to say," said Phil, "You get to keep your siblings with you."
"I just hope Kimi will be OK without me," said Chuckie.
"She'll be fine," said Tommy, "Remember she's with Susie."

What happens now?
12112211.title: Yeah

121122111.content: Do we follow the girls being ready for bed first?
121122111.title: It's bedtime.

1211221111.content:
"OK, kids, it's time for bed now," said Andrea.

She then handed Angelica, Susie, and the other girls over two some PJ's and helped Lil, Kimi, and the other girls under three get into theirs.

When that was done, she led all the girls over one into the bathroom to brush their teeth.
Once all their teeth were brushed, Andrea put Lil and the other girls under two into cribs, while the rest climbed into bed.
Then, she...
1211221111.title: Sure

12112211112.content: Did all the girls fall asleep right away, though?
12112211112.title: Sang a lullaby.

1211221112.content:
Henry said, "OK, boys, it's bedtime now," and helped Tommy, Chuckie, Phil, Dil, and the other boys under two into their PJs, while the boys aged three and up put their own on.

While Chuckie and the other boys over one went off to brush their teeth, Tommy and Phil had Henry brush whatever teeth they had, as did the other infant boys.

Then, Henry lifted Tommy, Phil, Dil, and the other boys under two into cribs while the rest climbed into beds.
Finally, Henry...
1211221112.title: The boys.

choices: Everyone sleeps in the same dorm.
12112212.content: How are the dorms sorted?
12112212.title: No.

121123.content: Who's the first to speak?
121123.title: Others

choices: Skip to them arriving at camp.
1212.content:
Chas then went outside and said, "Guess what kids? You're going to summer camp together! Susie and Angelica are coming too!".

"Yay!" said Tommy, Kimi, and the twins.
"I'm not so sure about this," said Chuckie, "This 'summer camp' place sounds kind of scary."
"It'll be fun!" said Tommy, "Susie's brothers and sister have all been. I heard them talking about it. And so has Timmy McNulty."
"Yeah, but they're all olderer than us," said Chuckie.
"We can't be in that much danger if Susie's there," said Kimi.
"I guess not," said Chuckie.

"And besides, I heard that in camp, we get to eat bugs!" said Phil.
"Do we have to?" said Chuckie.
"No," said Lil, "But I want to."

What happens now?
1212.title: Chaz.

12121.content: They continued talking, the others easing Chuckie's fears a bit at a time. Do we skip to them arriving at the camp?
12121.title: They keep talking.

121211.content:
A week later, everyone was arriving at camp.

"Wow, this place is so cool!" said Kimi.

Chuckie said nothing, just cautiously followed her.

"I agree," said Tommy to Kimi, "Look at all these new people."

"Will we get to see wild animals?" said Susie.

"Maybe we'll even get to eat some bugs!" said Phil.
"Just save some for me, Philip," said Lil.

"Ugh, there'd better be cookies here," said Angelica.

Just then, along came...
121211.title: Yeah

1212112.content: The other camper was a boy about 6?
1212112.title: Another camper.

12121121.content:
"Hi," said a boy, "I'm Cody, who are you?".
"I'm Susie," said Susie, "And this is Angelica who goes to preschool with me, her cousins Tommy and Dil, and their friends Chuckie, his sister Kimi, and Phil and Lil who are twins."
"I'm six," said Cody, "I know this place is for kids under five, but my mommy works here and she's letting me stay with the campers just to see what it's like."
"I'm three," said Angelica.
"So am I," said Susie, "And Chuckie and Kimi are two, Tommy and the twins are one, and Dil's only three months old."
What happens now?
12121121.title: Yeah

121211211.content: Said worker, Bernadette, a short girl in her twenties, neded Cody's help with something?
121211211.title: A worker comes up.

choices: Cheering up one of the campers.
1212112111.content: What did Bernadette need Cody's help with?
1212112111.title: Yeah

1212112112.content:
"Hi, kids," said the worker, "I'm Bernadette and welcome to the camp."
She then...
1212112112.title: Introduced herself.

12121122.content:
A girl walked up.
"Hi," she said, "I'm Rose. Who are you?"
"I'm Tommy," said Tommy, "And this is my brother Dil, my cousin Angelica, and my friends Susie, Chuckie, Kimi, Phil and Lil."
"I'm two," said Rose, "How old are you?"
"I'm also two," said Kimi, "And so is Chuckie. Angelica and Susie are three, Tommy, Phil, and Lil are one, and Dil is three months old."
What happens now?
12121122.title: A girl about 2 years old.

121211224.content: She shows them some toys she found or brought with her.
121211224.title: Rose shows them something.

1212112241.content:
"And you know what?" said Rose.
"What?" said Kimi.
"I brought some toys with me!",
And she took out the first toy, which was....
1212112241.title: Sure.

choices: Angelica tried to grab for it.
12121122411.content: Did Kimi gently take it?
12121122411.title: A doll.

choices: Something she found on the floor.
Some money she'd brought with her.
1212112242.content: What does Rose show the kids?
1212112242.title: SE

12121123.content: Who is this new camper?
12121123.title: Others.

choices: We skip to them *on their way* to camp.
121212.title: SE

1213.content: Who tells the kids about the camp?
1213.title: Someone else.

info.brief_description: Tommy, Dil, and all their friends are dropped off at a camp or school for the summer.
info.description:
Tommy, Dil, and all their friends are dropped off at a special day camp or preschool.

Here are the Rules.

1. The Gang are babies or toddlers.
2. The main Setting or location can be either a summer camp that is for babies or Toddlers only or The preschool that contains many Programs like The Mothers in Training Program (The part where Angelica, Susie, Harold take the tapes off the unknown babies diapers and causing them to fall off.)
3.Oc babies are welcomed.
4. Other than that, Have fun!
info.pretty_title: Preschool or Summer Camp for the Rugrats
